summary: Adds 4 female followers from the mer races.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]RECOMMENDED[/u][/size][/color][/font]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] if you want to see their face more clearly
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]Extensible Follower Framework[/url] for more follower functionality
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul[/url] for more follower commentary
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]Book of Silence[/url] by CaBaL120
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69784/?]Rustic Clothes[/url] by Gamwich
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76744/?]OSA | Skyrim Ascendancy Engine[/url] by CE0
[url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/3086-poser-module-for-osa-skyrim-ascendancy-engine/]Poser Module[/url] by Morra
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?]Remodeled armors[/url] By CT77

[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/size][/color][/font]

 Nexus Mod Manager or Mod Organizer for easy installation
For manual (NOT RECOMMENDED):
Simply extract the files to the main Skyrim directory
ALWAYS MAKE A BACKUP OF WHAT YOU'RE OVERWRITING!

[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]UN-INSTALLATION[/u][/size][/color][/font]

 NMM and MO un-installation is easy.
For manual: 
Delete the folders and .esp


[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]DESCRIPTION[/u][/size][/color]
[size=2]
[color=#ffffff]Adds 4 followers based on[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/43053737/?tb=mods&pUp=1]iPresets[/url] presets

[img]http://i.imgur.com/wf99VM2.png[/img]

[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]Mavfrei
[/u][/size][/color][/font]
Altmer
Voice: Female Sultry
Lvl 6-Max lvl
Essential, Marriageable 
Proficiency: Destruction, Conjuration, Restoration (Uses Ancano spell list)
Winterhold college

[img]http://i.imgur.com/hy0Ter1.png[/img]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]Ivhara
[/u][/size][/color][/font]
Orsimer
Voice: Female Orc
Lvl 6-Max lvl
Essential, Marriageable 
Proficency: Heavy Armor, Two Handed
Drunken Huntsman

[img]http://i.imgur.com/NNHMnfh.png[/img]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]Euphina[/u][/size][/color][/font]

Bosmer
Voice: FemaleEvenToned
Lvl 6-Max lvl
Essential, Marriageable
Proficency: Archery, Light Armor, Stealth
Ragged Flagon

[img]http://i.imgur.com/03VMZtS.png[/img]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]Leirifa
[/u][/size][/color][/font]
Dunmer
Voice: Female young eager
Lvl 6-Max lvl
Essential, Marriageable 
Proficiency: Destruction, Conjuration, Restoration
Sleeping Giant Inn

[size=5][u]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb]Q & A[/color][/font][/u][/size]

Q: What body are they using?
A: CBBE (More specifically using a bodyslide I made)

[/size][/color][/font][/u]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] by Kalilies
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73512/?]Leyenda Skin[/url] by HeroedeLeyenda
